dump_trial_as_jpg¶

dotsDB.dotsDB.dump_trial_as_jpg(trial_array, file_path)¶

Writes each frame from a trial as a separate .jpg file

To lump all files into a single trial.mp4 file from Linux Terminal, type: $ ffmpeg -framerate 60 -i frame-%0d.jpg -c:v libx264 -profile:v high -crf 20 -vf “pad=ceil(iw/2)*2:ceil(ih/2)*2” -pix_fmt yuv420p trial.mp4

Parameters

  • trial_array – numpy.ndarray as returned by extract_trial_as_3d_array()

  • file_path – (str) path up to folder included where images should be created

Returns
